content: Different minerals have different colors. But it is very rare to see the same mountain streaked with different colors.
This image is in Peru. This was known recently, however this was portrayed in the Quran 1400 years before it was discovered:

Have you not seen that Allah sends down water from the sky? With it We produce fruits of various colors. And in the mountains are streaks of white and red, varying in their hue and pitch-black. Mountains with streaked colors.
content_ar: ٢٧ أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ

content: Today we found such a location, however there is no such thing in the desert of Arabia.
How could an illiterate man who lived 1400 years ago have known about streaked colorful mountains?
